hints.text: Out of the team, not down the order
By 'decided', we mean who retains / wins the Ashes

questions.title: Let's chase
questions.question: England will choose to bowl every time they win a toss.
questions.hint: If England don't win a toss, then it's 0 points for everyone
questions.name: tf_chase

questions.title: Return of the King
questions.question: Jofra Archer will play at least ONE test.
questions.name: tf_jofra

questions.title: Bowl them out
questions.question: England will take 20 wickets in EVERY test.
questions.name: tf_20wickets

questions.title: Nighthawk
questions.question: Stuart Broad will bat higher than SEVEN at least once.
questions.name: tf_nighthawk

questions.title: Jason Roy'd
questions.question: England will drop a batter during the series.
questions.hint: Out of the team, not down the order
questions.name: tf_batterDrop

questions.title: Runs at the top
questions.question: Any opener (for either team) will score more runs than Rory Burns in 2019 (390).
questions.hint: Runs have to be scored opening
questions.name: tf_moreThanBurns

questions.title: Baz Ball
questions.question: England will score 175+ in a session
questions.name: tf_bazBall

questions.title: Loyalty to spin
questions.question: Jack Leach will play all FIVE tests.
questions.name: tf_leachy

questions.title: Back to form
questions.question: Joe Root will score a hundred
questions.name: tf_rootTon

questions.title: Dead Rubber
questions.hint: By 'decided', we mean who retains / wins the Ashes
questions.question: The Ashes will be decided before the 5th Test.
questions.name: tf_decided
